item.title: Dodgey command, anyone know whats up?
item.dc:creator: @Xizl_Halton_Xizl Xizl_Halton_Xizl
item.description:
@Xizl_Halton_Xizl wrote:

} else if(cmd[0].equals("yell")) { String yellText = playerCommand.substring(5); if (p.yellTimer > 0); int yellSecs = p.yellTimer / 2; p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have " + yellSecs + " seconds left to yell again.");

then when i go into the cmd file to run all it says i have 2 errors
wich are these

[code].\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\commands.java:59: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable yellTimer
locarion: class palidino76.rs2.players.player
if (p.yellTimer > 0);
^

.\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\commands.java:60: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable yellTimer
locarion: class palidino76.rs2.players.player
int yellSecs = p.yellTimer / 2;
^[/code]

Read full topic
